titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Small Business.

calendar.text: Committee on Small Business ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Small Business. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Bumpers. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/16/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on Small Business, from March 1, 1987, through February 29, 1988, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; and (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel.
